# 𓅐 𓄿 𓅀 𓅒 𓅂 tyw® 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 طير ṭīr Tier tuer

𓅐 𓄿 𓅀 𓅒 󳵒 󳵓 󳵔 󳵕 󳳑 󳳒 󳳓 󳳔 󳳕 󳳖 󳳗 󳳘 󳳙 󳳚 󳳛 󳳜 󳳝 󳳞 󳳟 󳳠 󳳡 󳳢 󳳣 󳳤 󳳥 󳳦 󳳧 󳳨 󳙏

𓄿 eagle < 𓅀 αἰγυπιός aigupiós < γύψ gúps 𓅐
Aelian describes the aegypius as "halfway between a vulture (gyps) and an eagle".
𓄿 Egyptian “vulture” Aegypius Accipitridae αἰγυπιός aigupiós “vulture” bearded vulture Gypaetus barbatus ?
𓄿 Egyptian “vulture” Neophron percnopterus

𒄷 ḪU ಹಕ್ಕಿ hakki hawk 𒀝 *ʔak 𓄿 𓋴 𓅯 aǧ… •αἰγυπιός Egyptian Vulture

vulture ⇔ nature 𓈖 𓇑 𓇑 𓏏 𓇳 / 𓈖 𓏏 𓊖

𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | nvulture@SEM ++ ⇔ Mutter nature
𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | •nadzar نَظَر naẓar nazar (Semit, Turk, Malay!) נשר nesher
𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | •nadzar nattoraliusaq ⇔ nattoralik (“eagle”) @ Greenlandic

𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | 𒉡𒌝𒈠𒄷 nu-um-ma numma 𓅂 tier 𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 | vulture | 𒉢𒉢𒁓𒁓𒄷𒄷 numma mušen

𓈖 𓐍 𓃀 𓇑 𓏏 𓅐 | Nekhbet | •necro-ba'at

𓇑 𓃀 𓏌 𓏏

𒍣𒁍 zi-bu > сип sip sȕp sup “vulture” Slavic *sǫpъ ⇔
𒍣𒁍 zi-bu γύψ gúps αἰγυπιός aigupiós “vulture” @ Egypt +++ !!!
𒍣𒁍 zi-but gypt > गिद्ध giddh “vulture”
𒍣𒁍 zbi-bu სვავი svavi “vulture” +++
𒍣𒁍 (designation of locust ), vulture

𒅆𒍣 SI see spect

𓌴 𓁹 𓄿 𓄿 | see, look | naẓara (𓌴 new sight)
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓁹 | see, look | nadzar : sight, look نَظَرَ naẓara

nazar 1. look, gaze, eye, evil eye
=> An eye-shaped amulet supposed to protect against the evil eye in certain cultures.

secondary:
nattoraq “eagle’s beak” => “crookedly whittled bone, part of towlines for kayaks”

𓁹 𓄿 رَخَم raḵam, “Egyptian vulture”
